name: mojikura-idl
description: 文字倉字形描述語言 MojiKura Ideographic Description Language

scripts.build: coffee --map -o lib -c src && coffee --map -o lib -c options.coffee
scripts.push: git add . && git commit -m'update' && git push
scripts.pub: npm run build && npm run doctoc && npm run push && npm version patch && npm publish
